attributes.action: Reinstate or increase funding for iniatives tackling LGBTQ+ Bullying in schools
attributes.additional_details: As an individual who was bullied in school for being gay I know first hand the serious mental and in some cases physical harm bullying can lead to. This is also a point of principle. If the government believes in equality for the LGBTQ+ Community they should protect the community from bullying.
attributes.background: In response to the recent ending of funding for anti-LGBTQ+ bullying iniatives, I would like the government to reinstate and increase funding to tackle the very serious issue of homophobia, biphobia and transphobia in schools.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561059
